title: About

This website will be used as a repository of ideas, materials and discussions stemming out of the Neural Networks reading group at the [University of Bristol](https;//www.bris.ac.uk). The reading group is organized by [Mauro Camara Escudero](https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4147-6606) and [Pierre-Aurelien Gilliot](https://research-information.bristol.ac.uk/en/persons/pierreaurelien-m-a-gilliot(57c79a71-a439-4d5f-84c2-8b311a6dbf51).html).
